PicoCSS.description: Minimal CSS for semantic HTML, ideal for simple and clean designs with a focus on readability and mobile responsiveness.
PicoCSS.useCases: Personal blogs, small business websites, minimalistic portfolios.

Bootstrap.description: Comprehensive front-end framework for responsive and mobile-first projects, suitable for rapid prototyping and production-ready web applications.
Bootstrap.useCases: E-commerce sites, educational platforms, dashboards, complex web applications.

Materialize.description: Combines Material Design's interaction design philosophy with responsive web design, perfect for creating material design compliant, visually appealing websites.
Materialize.useCases: User interfaces with rich features and animations, admin panels, dynamic web apps.

Bulma.description: Modern, flexible, and tile-based framework with a strong focus on vertical rhythm, readability, and simplicity, best for clean and engaging interfaces.
Bulma.useCases: Tech startups, creative agencies, modern portfolios.

TailwindCSS.description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development, highly customizable for crafting bespoke designs.
TailwindCSS.useCases: Custom user interfaces, design-heavy projects, single-page applications.

Foundation.description: Professional-grade, advanced responsive front-end framework aimed at creating ambitious web applications.
Foundation.useCases: Enterprise-level websites, responsive web applications, complex e-commerce sites.

SemanticUI.description: Empowers designers and developers by creating a language for sharing UI, perfect for readable and maintainable code.
SemanticUI.useCases: Community-driven websites, forums, and social media platforms.

Skeleton.description: Lightweight and simple boilerplate, suitable for smaller projects that don't need a lot of complex styles and components.
Skeleton.useCases: Landing pages, simple portfolios, introductory websites.
